content.description: This is another fun, moderate face climb on Obscura. Start in a scoop, follow a line of bolts, and pull over a small bulge to the anchors. The crux is between the 5th and 6th bolts. Note that the 6th bolt is not a great placement, so bring a long draw to thread through the bolt before clipping.
content.location:
It is about halfway between

Irrational Exuberance

and

Animal Spirits

is a small scoop with a bolt at the top that is the start of the climb.

content.description: On the left side of Obscura's main wall, just right of a shallow gully face, climb up good and fun rock following a line of bolts.
content.location: It is on the left side of Obscura's main wall just right of a shallow gully.

content.description: Fistful of Crypto is a short, fun route. There are multiple ways of climbing it - left and right of the bolts. The crux is between first and second bolt.
content.protection:
4 bolts to a two bolt anchor (which are to the right of the

Animal Spirits'

anchors).
content.location:
This ascends a shallow corner a few feet to the right of

Animal Spirits

.

content.description: On the right side of main Obscura face, follow four bolts to double ring anchors. The crux is between the first and second bolts, pulling over a bulge.
content.protection: Four bolts and double ring anchors.
content.location: Look for a small overhang with a little white rock and line of four bolts.
